meanings.definition: Behavior or beliefs that do not conform to prevailing social norms or standards.
meanings.sent1: Her nonconformisms made her stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent2: The artist's nonconformisms challenged traditional art forms.
meanings.sent3: His nonconformisms at the dinner party sparked interesting conversations.
meanings.sent4: The nonconformisms of the rebellious teenager were like a splash of color in a black-and-white world.
meanings.sent5: The nonconformisms of the group were a breath of fresh air in the stuffy office environment.

meanings.definition: The act of refusing to conform to established customs or practices.
meanings.sent1: The nonconformisms of the protest were met with mixed reactions.
meanings.sent2: She displayed her nonconformisms by wearing mismatched socks to work.
meanings.sent3: His nonconformisms in following the recipe led to a surprisingly delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: The nonconformisms of the team were a bold statement against conformity.
meanings.sent5: The nonconformisms of the student council election campaign were refreshing and unexpected.
